title: Maximum velocity of mass on spring shm

content.question: The maximum velocity occurs where the

choices.label: displacement from equilibrium is equal to the amplitude of 0.4 meter
displacement from equilibrium is half the amplitude
displacement from equilibrium is equal to zero

content.answer: displacement from equilibrium is equal to zero

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
